collection:
We may run any business data submitted to OpenAI’s services through automated
content classifiers and safety tools, including to better understand how our
services are used.

OpenAI may securely retain API inputs and outputs for up to 30 days to provide
the services and to identify abuse.

Then, we use data from ChatGPT users and human trainers to make sure the
outputs are safe and accurate and to improve their general capabilities.

OpenAI uses data from different places including public sources, licensed
third-party data, and information created by human reviewers.
sharing:
​​Authorized OpenAI
employees will only ever access your conversations for the purposes of
resolving incidents, recovering end user conversations with your explicit
permission, or where required by applicable law.

Our access to
conversations stored on our systems is limited to (1) authorized employees
that require access for engineering support, investigating potential platform
abuse, and legal compliance and (2) specialized third-party contractors who
are bound by confidentiality and security obligations, solely to review for
abuse and misuse.

Your fine-tuned models are for your use
alone and never served to or shared with other customers or used to train
other models.

Our access to API business data stored on our systems is limited to (1)
authorized employees that require access for engineering support,
investigating potential platform abuse, and legal compliance and (2)
specialized third-party contractors who are bound by confidentiality and
security obligations, solely to review for abuse and misuse.
